author: Howard Levitt
title: Howard Levitt: Why social distancing should be mandated by law in the workplace — not just in parks
description: If workers believe their health or safety is at risk, they have the right to refuse unsafe work
content:
John Tory, the frustrated mayor of Toronto, said he will be “turning up the heat” as he signed a new by-law requiring people to stay two metres apart from one another in city parks and public squares.
